title: bin/solr script should not enable remote JMX management (RMI connector) by default
description:
bin/solr.in.sh enables the JMX RMI connector by default; it should be disabled by default and leave it up to sys admins to enable it if needed ... change will be:

ENABLE_REMOTE_JMX_OPTS="false"

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1644978 from Timothy Potter in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1644978 ]

SOLR-6843: JMX RMI connector should be disabled by default but can be activated by setting ENABLE_REMOTE_JMX_OPTS to true in solr.in.(sh|cmd).
